text: @realDonaldTrump Please note. Dickless @realDonaldTrump doesn't care at all about the Coronavirus. He declares it cured. he magically says it will go away. entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
